title: Taos the Wizard Mouse
description: Taos is a mouse wizard with green eyes, who likes to solve different tasks using his magic knowledge. In this book, Taos wants to use magic to create his beloved cheese, but he discovers that he doesn't have all the magic ingredients. So he travels to the village to collect the needed ingredients. He stay upset that he doesn't have his cheese anymoreWhen he remembered a spell to create the cheese with sage flavor This is a graphical book and it is written in rhymes. It is a book that can be read on any hour, however, I recommend the bed night moment.
author: Evory Salieri
